AppRoutes.initializingError: An error occurred initializing. Please check your internet connection and restart your browser.
AppRoutes.requestError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try restarting your browser.
Diagnostics.heading: Diagnostics
InsecureSite.heading: Your connection is not private
InsecureSite.warningText: This website uses an insecure connection. Your data may be at risk. Do not enter any sensitive information, such as passwords or credit card numbers, on this site.
InvalidEntitlements.description: Please contact Support and try again.
InvalidEntitlements.loginHeading: There was a problem with your account
NeedEntitlements.instructions: Allstate Ad Blocker lets you browse with confidence. To use Allstate Ad Blocker, you must upgrade your account.
NeedEntitlements.loginHeading: Upgrade for a safer browsing experience
NeedsAuth.description: Our technology lets you limit ads, block online trackers from gathering your data, and browse with confidence.
NeedsAuth.heading: Allstate Ad Blocker
ScoreCard.contentBlockingDisabled: You've disabled Allstate Ad Blocker. To block ads and trackers, visit {settingsLink}.
ScoreCard.errorDescription: {appName} encountered an error and needs to be reloaded.
ScoreCard.insecureDescription: This website uses an insecure connection
ScoreCard.loadingDescription: {appName} is loading the data and is not yet active.
ScoreCard.protectPrivacyOnThisSiteDescri: When enabled, you'll see fewer ads and websites won't track your data without consent.
ScoreCard.protectPrivacyOnThisSiteLabel: Block ads and trackers on this site
ScoreCard.safeDescription: We're continually monitoring websites for phishing, malware, breaches, and more. If you navigate to a site that we're not sure is safe, we'll let you know.
ScoreCard.unknownDescription: We've checked for phishing, malware, breaches, and more. We're unable to verify the safety of this site.
ScoreCard.unknownHeading: This site may not be safe
ScoreCard.unsafeDescription: We're continually monitoring websites for phishing, malware, breaches, and more. We've found that this site may be compromised or unsafe.
Settings.analyticsDescription: When enabled, we collect usage analytics for the purpose of improving your experience. We do not share any usage analytics with third parties and do not collect any personally identifiable information. To learn more, please visit our {privacyPolicyLink}.
Settings.blockAdsAndTrackersDescription: Removes most ads and trackers from the sites you visit.
Settings.displayUnencryptedSiteWarningDe: When enabled, you will see a warning dialog if you attempt to visit a site that is not using a secure connection. This is intended to protect your privacy and prevent malicious attacks.
Settings.enableTrackingProtectionDescrip: Automatically remove tracking parameters from URLs to protect your online privacy and prevent targeted advertising.
Settings.heading: Allstate Ad Blocker settings
Settings.modalContent: Are you sure you want to log out?
Settings.trackingProtectionWarningConten: This feature may cause some sites to display incorrectly or not load as expected. Disabling tracking protection may address this.
SignIn.errorFeedback: An error occurred during registration. Please try again.
SignIn.instructions: Sign in to {link} and use the code below to complete verification:
SignIn.loggedoutDescription: Log back in to enable Allstate Ad Blocker.
SuccessfulLogin.description: You've successfully logged in to Allstate Ad Blocker. We'll start blocking ads automatically. You can adjust your preferences in Settings.
UnprotectedSites.deleteModalDescription: This will enable Allstate Ad Blocker for this site. You'll see fewer ads, and companies won't be able to track your data without consent.
UnprotectedSites.emptyStateText: You haven't yet added any trusted websites to your list. Once you mark a website as trusted, ads and trackers will be enabled on that site, which may improve performance.
UnprotectedSites.heading: Your trusted websites
UnprotectedSites.siteRemovedSuccessText: Allstate Ad Blocker is now enabled for {host}.
UnprotectedSites.subHeading: Ads and trackers are not blocked on these sites:
UnsafeSite.acknowledgeText: I acknowledge that this site may be compromised and still want to enter.
UnsafeSite.heading: This site may be compromised
UnsafeSite.warningText1: Our system checks for phishing, malware, breaches, and more.
UnsafeSite.warningText2: We've identified that this site may be compromised.
UpdateRequired.heading: is out of date
app.appDescription: Allstate Ad Blocker provides automated blocking of unwanted ads and prevents data gathering by online trackers.
app.author: Allstate Identity Protection
safari.contentBlockerAdsDescription: A content blocker for {appName} that blocks advertisements.
safari.contentBlockerPrivacyDescription: A content blocker for {appName} that blocks tracking content.
safari.contentBlockerSocialDescription: A content blocker for {appName} that blocks social content.
safari.unsafeSiteBlockerDescription: A content blocker for Safe Browsing Extension that restricts access to malicious websites.
safari.webExtensionDescription: The main web extension component of {appName}.
safariApp.appOffText: {appName} is currently off. You can turn it on in Safari Extensions preferences.
safariApp.quitButton: Quit and Open Safari Extensions Preferences…
